NAME: Beaufort
MESSAGE: Crews continue to work around the clock to restore power to customers. Our plans are to substantially complete restorations in Beaufort County by 11:45PM September 14th. Due to accessibility issues and extent of damages, the outages on Daufuskie and Fripp Islands could potentially exceed this estimated time of restoration.

NAME: Charleston
MESSAGE: Crews continue to work around the clock to restore power to customers. Our plans are to substantially complete restorations in Charleston County by 11:45PM September 14th.
